items.summary: Add null-check guard in the global state store initialization. If '__store' is null or undefined, immediately re-initialize it with default values: subscription tier set to 'free' and an empty user profile object.
Force-reset the application view to 'homepage-view' as the primary entry point in App.tsx. Ensure the view hierarchy respects this as the default starting state.
Re-bind the 'Start Journey' button on the homepage to properly trigger the login portal overlay. Verify the click handler transitions the view state to 'login' correctly.
Repair localStorage persistence for User Name and Subscription Tier. Ensure localStorage calls correctly save and retrieve these values during authentication flow and session restoration.

Ensure the dashboard view remains hidden when a user is not logged in. Add a conditional check that prevents dashboard rendering if authentication state is invalid, rather than attempting to render and crashing the store.
Re-inject the Spectral Analysis component (LiveSpectralAnalysis) into the dashboard once the store is validated and initialized. Ensure it renders in the Command Center layout as before.
Re-inject the Asset Shield component (AssetShieldCard) into the dashboard once the store is validated and initialized. Ensure it renders in the Command Center layout as before.
Maintain the high-end dark theme with glassmorphic UI styling from previous stable versions throughout the dashboard and component restoration. Preserve scanlines, gradients, and tactical aesthetics.
